remarks: Range of the recursive sequence builder.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
seqcl2.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` M ) e. C ) $.
seqcl2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. C ) $.
seqf2.3 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
seqf2.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
seqf2.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( ZZ>= ` ( M + 1 ) ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. D ) $.
seqf2 $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( .+ , F ) : Z --> C ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d ph x y $.
